group_1.textLeft: This is where we're supposed to meet…

group_1.textRight: Thanks for coming!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you were one of the students in my diabolo@class…

group_1.textRight: Yeah, my name's Rei.
I wanted to study with you one more time,
so I called the people at the diabolo school.
They told me Urara wasn't gonna be teaching@anymore…
But I couldn't give up, so I kept calling again@and again.
I was able to get in touch with a person who@they said was your manager.

group_1.textLeft: Y'know, I was surprised to hear from him, too.
So why'd you wanna get diabolo lessons@from me again?

group_1.textRight: I tried the trick you taught me earlier@at a competition,
but it wasn't enough to make it to finals.
That's why I want to learn some harder tricks@from you!

group_1.textLeft: Even if you don't win,
I think it's just fun to pull off tricks@in a cool way, y'know?

group_1.textRight: That's not enough! If I wanna beat that girl@in a competition, I've gotta…

group_1.textLeft: Who are you talking about…?

group_1.textRight: There was this girl who could pull off the most@amazing tricks so easily…
A prodigy…or something.@But when I realized we were the same age,
I thought, "I don't want to lose to her."
Please, Urara!@Teach me the Urara Special!
If it's a trick you picked up back in elementary@school,
I'm sure I can figure it out too, right?!

group_1.textLeft: I don't mind teachin' you, it's just…
See, I got the inspiration from watchin' a street@performer named Komaborou,
whose tricks I used as a reference.
So I suggest tryin' to imitate Komaborou's@performance first!
I think there's a video of it…
…Ah, here! I found it, see!
Somethin' wrong…?

group_1.textRight: I couldn't do it…

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: I already tried…copying the performer@in that video…
But I couldn't do it at all…
Urara, when you were in elementary school,@you couldn't copy it right away either, right?
After all, people who can do that are just@born different…

group_1.textLeft: Ah…!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]Alley-oop!

group_1.textRight: Eh? That trick is…!

group_1.textLeft: I'm copyin' your newest stunt, Kurara!

group_1.textRight: …You can do it already, huh…

group_1.textLeft: We're gonna look awesome pullin' this off@together at our next performance!

group_1.textRight: Yeah…
…Um, do you have any tips on how to pick up@on things faster?

group_1.textLeft: Um, uhh…@Watch reeaaal close and stay motivated?

group_1.textRight: What's that supposed to mean?@That's so "you", it makes me smile.

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Kurara!@We gotta practice for the show!

group_1.textRight: …Uh-huh, alright.

group_1.textCenter: (Kurara was tryin' real hard to catch up@with me.)
(But then I said somethin' insensitive and@hurt her feelings…)

group_1.textLeft: …Rabi.

group_1.textRight: Mm…

group_1.textLeft: Without denyin' the regrets I have about not@noticin' Kurara's feelings…
What I gotta do to overcome that pain@and grow…
I think I know what that is now, see.

group_1.textRight: Then all that's left is to do it.

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh…!
Sorry…
Look, I can't teach you my tricks off the cuff.

group_1.textRight: Oh, no…

group_1.textLeft: But I'm gonna practice with you.
And I'll try my best to teach you the stuff you@don't know yet, and everythin' you wanna learn!
So I want you to let me be your coach!

group_1.textRight: Really…?!

group_1.textLeft: No doubt about it!@We're in this together, see!
But, uh…
I dunno if I'll be able to teach you well enough…

group_1.textRight: …I'll stay with you until the very end.

group_1.textLeft: …! [wait:1.0][chara:103601:motion_100][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]@Thanks a bunch, Rabi!
